block.p: 4-bedroom, 5-bath, 2-family 1851 town house to be used as one-family residence; dining room, breakfast room, sitting room, 4 fireplaces, French doors, bay windows, rear deck, 19-by-103-ft. lot; taxes $11,364; listed at $2.95 million, 1 year on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

4-bedroom, 5-bath, 2-family 1851 town house to be used as one-family residence; dining room, breakfast room, sitting room, 4 fireplaces, French doors, bay windows, rear deck, 19-by-103-ft. lot; taxes $11,364; listed at $2.95 million, 1 year on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 900-sq.-ft. penthouse co-op in a prewar building; renovated kitchen and baths, exposed brick walls, beamed ceilings, 2 decorative fireplaces; maintenance $1,046, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $355,000 (multiple bids), 12 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining foyer, 2 exposures, common garden; maintenance $2,099, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $745,000, 18 weeks on market (broker: Ashforth Warburg)

2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,650-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, maid's room, fireplace; maintenance $1,251, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $975,000 (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,445-sq.-ft. condo in a 4-year-old building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, marble baths, hardwood floors, floor-to-ceiling windows, 3 exposures; common charge $607, taxes $4,380; listed at $1.15 million, 1 week on market (broker: Corcoran Group)
5-bedroom, 2-bath, turn-of-the-century row house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, gas fireplace; taxes $1,800; listed at $469,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Aguayo & Huebener)

5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 4-story brownstone; dining room, eat-in kitchen, triple parlor, parquet floors, 5 decorative fireplaces, pier mirrors, stained-glass windows, original moldings and detail, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,570; listed at $1.9 million, 4 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,250-sq.-ft. co-op in a former factory building; dining area, hardwood floors, beamed ceilings, common courtyard; maintenance $652, 55% tax-deductible; listed at $420,000, 1 week on market (broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 75-year-old colonial; entry foyer, dining room, eat-in kitchen with breakfast nook, recreation room, 2 fireplaces, hardwood floors, 2-car garage, 70-by-150-ft. lot; taxes $4,220; listed at $839,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: ReMax/ Universal)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 34-year-old split-level; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, vaulted ceilings, fireplace, 2-car garage, .34-acre lot; taxes $9,847; listed at $629,000, 4 weeks on market (brokers: Julia B. Fee; Coldwell Banker/Country Properties)

5-bedroom, 2-bath, 104-year-old Victorian; grand entrance hall, upgraded kitchen with butler's pantry, dining room, music room, 2 fireplaces, 2-car garage, pool and poolhouse, 1.03-acre lot; taxes $5,831; listed at $519,900, 10 weeks on market (broker: William Pitt Real Estate)

3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 48-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen with pantry, solarium, finished basement, 2-car garage, .72-acre lot with waterfront and dock on Long Island Sound; taxes $13,194; listed at $3.3 million, 1 week on market (brokers: Sotheby's International; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)
